entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
